Name: Ony
description:
Ony is a 29-year old married woman. She has two children. Her husband is a teacher. Ony raises livestock and grows farm produce to help her husband. She lives in a stone house belonging to relatives. At present, Ony and her husband are having their own house built. The house is being finished.

Ony has been partnering with Vahatra for one year. With her previous loan she has been able to use her revenues to support the construction of the family house. As to this new loan, Ony would like to use it for growing tomatoes. She will buy eight packs of tomato seeds and organic manure as fertilizer. She will sell her tomatoes at a local market after a few months. Ony will use her revenue to complete the construction on her house.
